Package com.tailf.ncs.alarmman

The Alarm Manager provides utilities for management of the NCS alarm list.

See: Description

Package com.tailf.ncs.alarmman Description

The Alarm Manager provides utilities for management of the NCS alarm list. The main features are:
  • Injection of alarms - the user is provided with an API to inject alarms in to the NCS Alarm list.
  • Subscription of alarms from the NCS alarm list - the user can subscribe to updated alarms
The following functions are available in the sub-packages of alarmman:

  • Alarm classes and util classes: com.tailf.ncs.alarmman.common

  • Alarm subscription capabilities: com.tailf.ncs.alarmman.consumer

  • Alarm creation capabilities: com.tailf.ncs.alarmman.producer 

                      - Subscribers (AlarmSource) -
